sentence.Network_en: Obviously it was Anne's considered opinion that Mavis was a bold-faced liar.
sentence.Network_cn: 安妮认为梅维斯是个厚颜无耻的骗子，这显然是经过一番深思熟虑后才得出的看法。

sentence.Network_en: Mavis: I'm not so sure. You can't teach an old dog new tricks you know.
sentence.Network_cn: 玛薇丝: 我可不这麽肯定. 你也知道老狗学不会新把戏.

sentence.Network_en: Mavis: It's a certificate of ownership. I've just bought some property on the moon.
sentence.Network_cn: 梅维斯: 这是一纸产权, 我刚买了一些月球上的土地.
